attr.title: Strikey Sisters
attr.desc:
Say hello to a fantasy themed action arcade brick breaker! Featuring cute characters, silly humor, powerful magic, crazy bosses, and even local 2 player co-op mode!
-Fast-paced brick breaker action!
-Intense boss battles!
-Local 2 player co-op mode.
-Three difficulty modes.
-Travel and conquer the world map in any order you want!
-Unique player, ball, and spell power-ups!
-Highly replayable! Uncover all the map, collect gems, unlock secret areas and extra levels, and complete the bestiary!
-Polished and colorful pixel art visuals.
-Catchy synth-fantasy soundtrack.
-Cheesy 90's game voice acting!
attr.inst:
Purchase the game either from https://dyagames.itch.io/strikey-sisters OR https://store.steampowered.com/app/643880/Strikey_Sisters/ 

Itch.io
Download Strikey Sisters (Linux Ubuntu 14.04 LTS) [updated on Apr 05, 2018],  copy all files from /assets to /ports/strikeysisters/gamedata

Steam
Run steam console via Windows+R: Type: steam://open/console, download the linux version by typing: download_depot 643880 643883 in the console, when the download is complete, it will tell you the location of the folder,  copy all files from /assets to /ports/strikeysisters/gamedata
